name: UICop Rules
description: Professional UICop ruleset for Business Central UI development

rules.justification: Fields must have ToolTip property set
OnValidate triggers must not modify UI elements
Use AccessByPermission on actions and fields correctly
Don't set back-colors on pages
Page fields should have proper spacing
Do not add page controls that are not used
Required fields should be highlighted
Page actions must have meaningful captions
Use proper image on action items
ToolTips must be descriptive
Caption must be properly capitalized
Actions must have proper promotion in the UI
Pages should have AboutTitle and AboutText properties
Fields should have ShowMandatory set when required
Page groups must have proper GroupType
PromotedCategory must be set for promoted actions
Use proper field grouping on pages
Arrange fields in logical layout on list pages
Fields with the same name should have consistent captions
Pages must have instructions
